mapper.insert: insert into sys_role_menu(menu_id, role_id) select a.id, #{roleId} from sys_menu a where not exists(select 1 from sys_role_menu tmp where tmp.role_id = #{roleId} and tmp.menu_id = a.id)
mapper.delete: delete from sys_role_menu a where a.role_id = #{roleId} and not exists (select 1 from sys_menu tmp where tmp.id = a.menu_id)
